attributes.action: provide homes for Army Veterans and support them through counselling, etc
attributes.additional_details: These Army Veterans have put their lives on the line for me and the country to protect and security the country we live in. it is our right and duty to provide these homes and support for them. After watching DIY SOS programme on BBC 1 on Thursday night you realise that we need to do more for these veterans. Prince William and Prince Harry have endorsed the DIY SOS project. Please support this project and carry on the work that has started by DIY SOS team
attributes.background: provide homes and support for our Army veterans who don't have homes or struggling through mental illness. Provide them with the right types of homes if they are disabled, etc.
